Class HotelReviews

  • java.lang.Object
    • HotelReviews

  • public class HotelReviews
extends java.lang.Object
    This program reads a text file that contains integers and strings. It calculates the average of each column and determines the maximum value, and then perfomes a parallel sorthing on the corresponding strings. The program then displays the result.
    Version:
    (CSC142 02/28/2018)
    Author:
    (Kemba Konteh)
